detaileddescription.para: This method sets both the horizontal and vertical margins to the same value. The margins can be individually controlled using the setMarginX() and setMarginY() methods.
Margins are set using the current layout units.

briefdescription.para: Sets the horizontal margin between the edge of the frame and the label contents, in layout units.

detaileddescription.para: The caller takes responsibility for deleting the returned object.

briefdescription.para: Draws the item's contents using the specified item render context.

detaileddescription.para: Note that the context's painter has been scaled so that painter units are pixels. Use the QgsRenderContext methods to convert from millimeters or other units to the painter's units.

memberdef.argsstring: (const QDomElement &element, const QDomDocument &document, const QgsReadWriteContext &context) override
memberdef.name: readPropertiesFromElement

briefdescription.para: Sets item state from a DOM element.

detaileddescription.para:
element
is the DOM element for the item
document
DOM document
context
read write context
Note that item subclasses should not rely on all other items being present in the layout at the time this method is called. Instead, any connections and links to other items must be made in the finalizeRestoreFromXml() method. E.g. when restoring a scalebar, the connection to the linked map's signals should be implemented in finalizeRestoreFromXml(), not readPropertiesFromElement().

briefdescription.para: Stores item state within an XML DOM element.

parameterdescription.para: is the DOM element to store the item's properties in

briefdescription.para: Track when QWebPage has finished loading its html contents.
Called when the content is changed to handle HTML loading.
Creates an encoded stylesheet url using the current font and label appearance settings.
